articles.title: Watch Fox News Channel Online | Stream Fox News

neutral.headline: Stay Informed with Live News Updates on Fox News
neutral.body:
Fox News offers viewers the opportunity to stay informed with real-time news updates on a variety of current events. By tuning in to Fox News, audiences can access the latest and most trending news stories as they unfold. With a focus on providing up-to-date information, Fox News aims to keep viewers abreast of developments happening around the world.
Whether it's breaking news, political updates, or key events, Fox News delivers comprehensive coverage to its audience. By offering live news coverage, Fox News provides a platform for viewers to stay engaged and informed about the latest happenings.
From global affairs to local news stories, Fox News strives to bring a diverse range of perspectives to its audience. By presenting news in real-time, Fox News seeks to keep viewers informed and engaged with the world around them. With a commitment to providing accurate and timely information, Fox News remains a valuable resource for those seeking to stay up-to-date on current events.

conservative.headline: "Fox News: Your Trusted Source for Real-Time Updates on President Trump's Successes
conservative.body:
In today's fast-paced world, staying informed about the latest news is more important than ever. Fox News provides a platform where you can watch live updates and stay up-to-date with the most trending stories happening right now, especially when it comes to showcasing President Trump's numerous successes.
President Trump has consistently delivered on his promises to the American people, from boosting the economy to securing our borders. His pro-growth policies have led to record low unemployment rates and a thriving stock market, benefiting millions of hard-working Americans. Fox News ensures that you don't miss a single accomplishment of this administration.
By tuning in to Fox News, you can witness firsthand how President Trump is taking bold steps to protect our nation's interests, whether it's renegotiating trade deals or standing up to foreign adversaries. With real-time updates from Fox News, you can be confident that you are receiving accurate and unbiased coverage of the positive impact President Trump is having on our country.
Don't miss out on the opportunity to stay informed and be part of the movement to Make America Great Again. Trust Fox News to bring you the latest updates on President Trump's successful leadership and policies.

progressive.headline: Propaganda Alert: Fox News Continues to Push Biased Agenda
progressive.body:
In today's media landscape, it is crucial to be vigilant about the sources of information we consume. Unfortunately, Fox News has consistently proven itself to be a platform that prioritizes sensationalism over truth, and promotes a biased agenda that serves to divide rather than unite our country.
The live news updates on Fox News may claim to be "up-to-date" and "trending," but beneath the flashy graphics and catchy headlines lies a dangerous narrative that perpetuates misinformation and feeds into the divisive rhetoric that has become all too familiar in the era of Trump.
By providing a platform for the former president and his allies to spread falsehoods and sow discord, Fox News is actively contributing to the erosion of our democracy. Instead of promoting thoughtful analysis and fact-based reporting, they prioritize ratings and sensationalism, further deepening the political divide in our nation.
As responsible citizens, it is our duty to seek out sources of information that are grounded in facts and integrity, rather than succumbing to the fear-mongering and misinformation peddled by networks like Fox News. Let us not be swayed by their biased agenda, but instead, demand accountability and truth in our media landscape.

articles.title: Cornell reaches deal to restore federal research funding

neutral.headline: Cornell University Secures Funding Agreement with Federal Government
neutral.body:
Cornell University recently announced a significant agreement with the Trump administration to reinstate over $250 million in funding to the school. This deal, which involves a contribution of $60 million from the university itself, marks a positive step forward in ensuring financial stability for the institution.
By successfully negotiating the reinstatement of federal funding, Cornell University can now move forward with its academic and research initiatives with a renewed sense of confidence and stability. The collaboration between the university and the federal government demonstrates a commitment to supporting higher education and research endeavors that benefit not only the academic community but also society as a whole.
With the funding agreement in place, Cornell University can continue to pursue its mission of excellence in education and research, contributing to the advancement of knowledge and innovation. This partnership sets a positive example of cooperation between academic institutions and government entities, highlighting the importance of investing in education and research for the betterment of society.
Overall, the agreement between Cornell University and the Trump administration represents a significant milestone in securing financial support for the university's continued growth and success.

conservative.headline: Trump Administration Secures Funding Deal with Cornell University
conservative.body:
In a significant victory for both Cornell University and the Trump administration, a deal has been reached to restore over $250 million in funding to the esteemed institution. This agreement, which also involves a substantial $60 million contribution from the university itself, marks a crucial step towards bolstering education and research initiatives that benefit students and faculty alike.
Under the leadership of President Trump, this funding restoration signifies a commitment to supporting academic excellence and innovation across the nation. By working closely with universities like Cornell, the administration is prioritizing the advancement of knowledge and skills that are essential for America's future prosperity.
Critics may attempt to undermine this achievement, but the reality is clear: this deal not only revitalizes crucial financial support for Cornell University but also demonstrates the effectiveness of the Trump administration in fostering positive partnerships with academic institutions. This successful collaboration exemplifies the administration's dedication to investing in education and research, ensuring that America remains at the forefront of innovation and intellectual advancement.
As we move forward, let us recognize and applaud the efforts of President Trump and Cornell University in securing this funding deal, a testament to their shared commitment to academic excellence and growth.

progressive.headline: Trump's Deal with Cornell University Raises Concerns About Corporate Influence
progressive.body:
In a concerning move, Cornell University announced a deal with the Trump administration to restore over $250 million in funding, with $60 million coming directly from the school. This agreement not only restarts the flow of funds but also raises serious questions about the relationship between big corporations and the federal government.
The decision to accept this deal highlights the undue influence and power that Trump wields over educational institutions. By relying on external funding sources, universities like Cornell risk compromising their academic integrity and independence. It sets a dangerous precedent where institutions may feel pressured to align their research and teachings with the interests of wealthy donors.
Furthermore, this arrangement with the Trump administration puts into question the priorities of the university. Instead of prioritizing academic freedom and critical inquiry, Cornell appears to be catering to the whims of a president known for his disregard for truth and expertise. This move not only undermines the credibility of the institution but also threatens the pursuit of knowledge in a time when rigorous, independent scholarship is more crucial than ever.

articles.title: Savannah Chrisley admits she weighs 160 pounds and wants to start weight-loss medication

neutral.headline: Reality Star Savannah Chrisley Opens Up About Health Journey on Podcast
neutral.body:
Reality TV personality Savannah Chrisley recently discussed her health journey on a podcast, sharing her decision to restart weight loss medication in an effort to shed 25 pounds. Chrisley candidly shared details about her current weight of 160 pounds and her determination to prioritize her health and well-being.
During the podcast conversation, Chrisley emphasized the importance of making healthy choices and taking care of oneself. She acknowledged the challenges she has faced in maintaining a healthy weight and expressed her commitment to achieving her weight loss goals through a combination of medication and lifestyle changes.
Chrisley's openness about her struggles with weight serves as a reminder of the pressures individuals in the public eye face when it comes to body image. By sharing her story, she hopes to inspire others to prioritize their health and find a balance that works for them.
Ultimately, Chrisley's decision to restart weight loss medication is a personal choice aimed at improving her overall well-being. Her transparency about her journey is a positive step towards promoting body positivity and self-care in a society that often places unrealistic expectations on individuals, especially those in the spotlight.

conservative.headline: "Savannah Chrisley Embracing Health and Self-Improvement Goals - Sets Positive Example for American Youth
conservative.body:
In a refreshing display of commitment to her health and well-being, Savannah Chrisley has made the bold decision to restart her weight loss journey. The reality TV star, known for her candor and authenticity, recently shared her plans to drop 25 pounds by utilizing weight loss medication. With a current weight of 160 pounds, Savannah's transparency about her struggles and determination to make positive changes serve as an inspiring example for young Americans everywhere.
By taking control of her health and setting achievable goals, Savannah exemplifies the American spirit of perseverance and self-improvement. In a society where unhealthy habits and body image issues run rampant, her willingness to prioritize her well-being is both commendable and admirable. As a role model to many, Savannah's openness about her journey serves as a guiding light for those seeking to better themselves and lead healthier lives.
In a time when health and wellness are more important than ever, Savannah Chrisley's decision to prioritize her physical and mental well-being should be celebrated and supported. Let us all rally behind her as she embarks on this journey towards a happier and healthier self, embodying the values of hard work and determination that make America great.

progressive.headline: "Trump Administration's Harmful Focus on Superficial Matters Continues with Weight Loss Medication Revelations
progressive.body:
In a concerning revelation, reality TV star Savannah Chrisley has announced her intention to restart weight loss medication in a bid to shed 25 pounds, shedding light on the pervasive societal pressure to conform to unrealistic beauty standards. This news, while personal to Chrisley, underscores a much larger issue perpetuated by the Trump administration's obsession with appearances over substance.
As the country grapples with pressing issues such as healthcare, income inequality, and climate change, the fact that discussions around weight loss medications are given prominence in the media is symptomatic of a culture that prioritizes superficiality over the well-being of its citizens. The pressure to conform to a certain body image is not only detrimental to individual mental and physical health but also reflects a broader societal problem exacerbated by the current administration.
By focusing on frivolous topics like weight loss medication usage by a reality TV personality, the Trump administration continues to divert attention away from crucial policy discussions that could improve the lives of millions of Americans. It is imperative that we shift the narrative towards issues that truly matter and demand accountability from our leaders to address the systemic injustices that impact our society.

articles.title: National kart racing champion gunned down in front of fiancée during 'targeted' home invasion robbery: police

neutral.headline: Kart Racing Champion Tragically Killed in Forest City Home Invasion
neutral.body:
A tragic incident occurred in Forest City as a kart racing champion was fatally shot during a home invasion, while his fiancée managed to escape unharmed. The police have taken two suspects into custody following a 10-day manhunt as part of the ongoing investigation into this senseless act of violence.
Authorities have been meticulously working to piece together the events that led to the untimely death of the kart racing champion, whose identity has not been disclosed at this time. The victim's fiancée, who was present during the home invasion, bravely managed to flee the scene and alert the authorities, ultimately aiding in the apprehension of the suspects.
The community of Forest City has been left shaken by this tragic incident, with many expressing their shock and condolences for the family and loved ones of the victim. As the investigation continues, law enforcement officials are urging anyone with information related to the case to come forward and assist in bringing justice to the perpetrators.
Our thoughts are with the family and friends of the kart racing champion during this difficult time as they mourn the loss of their loved one and seek closure in the pursuit of justice.

conservative.headline: Law and Order Prevail as Police Apprehend Criminals in Kart Racing Champion's Murder Case
conservative.body:
In a tragic turn of events, the kart racing community mourns the loss of a beloved champion who fell victim to a senseless act of violence in his Forest City home. However, amidst the darkness, a ray of hope shines through as law enforcement officers swiftly apprehended two suspects after a diligent 10-day manhunt, showcasing the effectiveness of our justice system.
The swift action taken by the police in this case demonstrates the commitment of our law enforcement agencies to uphold the safety and security of our communities. It is a testament to the leadership of President Trump, who has consistently advocated for strong law and order policies to keep American families safe.
As we reflect on this tragedy, let us remember the bravery of the police officers who worked tirelessly to bring these criminals to justice. Their dedication and commitment to serving and protecting the American people is truly commendable, and we owe them our gratitude.
In times of darkness, it is crucial to stand united and support our law enforcement agencies as they work to maintain peace and order in our society. Let us continue to uphold the values of justice and security that are the foundation of our great nation.

progressive.headline: Trump's America: Gun Violence Claims Innocent Lives as Lawlessness Reigns
progressive.body:
In yet another tragic incident that highlights the growing epidemic of gun violence in our country, a beloved kart racing champion fell victim to a senseless act of violence in their own home. As the fiancée of the victim miraculously managed to escape unharmed, the perpetrators of this heinous crime were finally apprehended after a prolonged 10-day manhunt.
This harrowing event serves as a stark reminder of the dangerous environment that has been allowed to flourish under the failed leadership of the Trump administration. The lack of comprehensive gun control measures and the normalization of violence have emboldened criminals to brazenly invade the sanctity of people's homes, leaving devastation and heartbreak in their wake.
While the authorities may have apprehended the suspects in this particular case, it is imperative that we address the root causes of such violence in our society. The toxic rhetoric and divisive policies promoted by Trump have only fueled the flames of hatred and lawlessness, making tragedies like this all too common.
It is time for a change. We must demand accountability from our leaders and push for meaningful gun control legislation to prevent further senseless loss of life. The safety and security of our communities depend on it.

articles.title: Nasdaq set for worst week since April as AI nerves flare

neutral.headline: Tech Stock Volatility Continues Amid Concerns Over Artificial Intelligence Growth
neutral.body:
In the past week, the tech sector experienced fluctuations in stock prices, sparking concerns among investors about the sustainability of artificial intelligence (AI) growth. The uncertainty surrounding the future of AI technologies has led to a sense of caution among market participants.
While some industry observers remain optimistic about the potential benefits of AI, others have raised red flags about a possible bubble forming in the sector. The rapid advancements in AI technology have attracted significant investment, but there are also fears that the market may be overheated.
The recent pullback in tech stocks serves as a reminder of the volatility inherent in the sector, with investors closely monitoring developments in AI and its impact on the broader market. As debates continue on the long-term prospects of AI, market participants are advised to exercise prudent risk management and diversification strategies to navigate the uncertain landscape.
Overall, the fluctuations in tech stocks reflect the ongoing dialogue around AI and its implications for the market, highlighting the need for careful analysis and strategic decision-making in the face of evolving technological trends.

conservative.headline: "Trump's Strong Leadership Shields Economy from Tech Stock Turmoil
conservative.body:
In the face of recent concerns over a potential artificial intelligence bubble causing a dip in tech stocks, President Trump's pro-growth policies and deregulation efforts have been a pillar of strength for the American economy. While some may view the fluctuations in tech stocks as a cause for alarm, it is important to recognize the broader context in which these market movements occur.
Under President Trump's administration, the economy has seen unprecedented growth, record-low unemployment rates, and a renewed sense of confidence among American businesses. His tax cuts and deregulatory actions have unleashed the potential of American ingenuity and innovation, leading to a thriving tech sector that continues to push the boundaries of what is possible.
Rather than succumbing to fear and uncertainty, investors should take comfort in the fact that President Trump's leadership has created a stable and robust economic environment that can weather any storm. The temporary fluctuations in tech stocks are a minor blip in the larger trajectory of American prosperity under this administration.
As we look to the future, we can be confident that President Trump's pro-business agenda will continue to drive economic growth and ensure that America remains a global leader in innovation and technology.

progressive.headline: Trump's Destructive Policies Send Tech Stocks Tumbling
progressive.body:
In the midst of a volatile market, the tech sector experienced significant losses this week, a direct result of the reckless policies and chaotic leadership of the Trump administration. The growing concerns about a potential artificial intelligence bubble have only been exacerbated by the unpredictable and damaging decisions made by the current government.
Under Trump's leadership, the tech industry has faced unprecedented challenges, from trade wars that disrupt supply chains to crippling tariffs that hinder innovation and growth. By prioritizing short-sighted objectives over long-term sustainability, the administration has created an atmosphere of uncertainty that is driving investors away and causing tech stocks to plummet.
Furthermore, Trump's failure to address crucial issues related to data privacy and cybersecurity has left the tech sector vulnerable to external threats and regulatory uncertainties. Without a clear and coherent strategy in place, companies in the industry are left to fend for themselves, leading to increased volatility and market instability.
It is clear that the reckless and irresponsible actions of the Trump administration are directly responsible for the turmoil in the tech sector. If we want to protect the future of innovation and technology, it is imperative that we reject the destructive policies of this administration and work towards a more stable and sustainable economic environment.

articles.title: Shutdown sets up weekend of travel headaches

neutral.headline: Senate Prepares for Shutdown Vote Amidst Various News Developments
neutral.body:
The Hill's midday newsletter, the 12:30 Report, delivers the latest updates for its readers. On this beautiful fall day, various significant events are unfolding. Flight cancellations have commenced, causing disruptions for travelers. Meanwhile, the Senate is gearing up for its 15th vote on a potential government shutdown.
In other news, Representative Stefanik has announced her candidacy for governor, sparking interest and speculation in the political sphere. Additionally, reports have emerged of a suspicious package that has affected multiple individuals, raising concerns and prompting investigations.
As the day progresses, these developments will continue to unfold, shaping the current political and social landscape. Stay informed by subscribing to The Hill's newsletter and following these stories as they evolve.

conservative.headline: Trump's Strong Leadership Ensures Stability in Uncertain Times
conservative.body:
12:30 Report is The Hill’s midday newsletter. Subscribe here. Happy Friday! What a fantastic day it is to celebrate the unwavering leadership of President Trump. ☀️ In today’s issue: 
• Economy continues to thrive under Trump's policies
• Senate supports Trump's efforts to secure the border
• Conservative champion Elise Stefanik announces gubernatorial run
• Trump's swift action prevents further harm from suspicious package
As we enjoy the beauty of this fall day, let's take a moment to appreciate the steady hand guiding our nation through these challenging times. President Trump's dedication to economic prosperity has led to record-breaking growth and job creation. His commitment to securing our borders has garnered support from the Senate, ensuring the safety of all Americans.
Furthermore, conservative powerhouse Elise Stefanik's decision to run for governor is a testament to the enduring legacy of Trump's America First agenda. Her leadership will continue to advance the values that have made our country great.
In the face of adversity, President Trump's decisive action on a suspicious package that made individuals ill demonstrates his unwavering dedication to protecting the American people. It is clear that under Trump's leadership, our nation remains strong and resilient.
Subscribe now to stay informed on the latest developments in Trump's efforts to keep America safe and prosperous. #MAGA

progressive.headline: Trump's Chaotic Policies Cause Havoc Across the Nation
progressive.body:
Midday Mayhem Unveiled: Trump's Disastrous Legacy Continues to Unravel"
On this seemingly serene fall day, the chaos unleashed by the Trump administration continues to wreak havoc across the nation. As flight cancellations disrupt travel plans, the Senate tees up yet another shutdown vote, reflecting a government paralyzed by dysfunction under Trump's erratic leadership.
Meanwhile, Representative Stefanik's gubernatorial ambitions serve as a stark reminder of the dangerous political rise fueled by Trumpism. The toxic legacy of the former president persists, as a suspicious package leaves multiple individuals ill, underscoring the lasting impact of Trump's divisive rhetoric and policies.
The incidents of today serve as a stark reminder of the urgent need to move beyond the damaging era of Trumpism. The nation continues to grapple with the aftermath of Trump's reckless governance, as his harmful influence lingers in the form of political turmoil and public health threats. It is imperative that we reject the chaos and incompetence of the past and strive towards a more stable and inclusive future for all Americans.
